ygData.subject: ARCs -> NWA Toolset?
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone begun work on tools to make an ARC-based dataset available through the NWA Access Toolset (http://nwa.nb.no/) -- either by coercing the ARC data

From: Gordon Mohr <gojomo@...>
Subject: ARCs -> NWA Toolset?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

Has anyone begun work on tools to make an ARC-based dataset available
through the NWA Access Toolset (http://nwa.nb.no/) -- either by coercing
the ARC data into a Nedlib format or making a ARC-aware retriever/exporter?

Please keep us at the IA apprised of any progress, or any way we could
help with code or testing.

- Gordon @ Internet Archive
